days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

O God, who declare that You abide in hearts that are pure, grant that through the intercession of the Virgin blessed Veronica we may be so fashioned by Your grace, that we become a dwelling pleasing to You. Through our Lord Jesus Christ, your Son, who lives and reigns with You in the unity of the Holy Spirit, one God, for ever and ever.
Amen.
Prayer of Intercession to Saint Veronica Giuliani
Heavenly Father, Who in Saint Veronica, who was conformed to Your Son, You have given us a marvelous example of patience and of ardent charity.
Give to us, through her powerful intercession, to discover the sweetness found in the Cross and the grace of confidence as we implore: (mention your request here…)
We ask this through Christ our Lord.
Amen.
Prayer of St. Veronica Giuliani
My God, I ask You for nothing other than the salvation of poor sinners. Convert them all to You, all of them to You. Set me as a go-between between You and sinners. Let torments come. Love will endure everything. Love has conquered, and Love Himself has been conquered. For the soul feels Him inside her in a manner I cannot describe.
Prayer to Saint Veronica Giuliani
Saint Veronica Giuliani, the stigmata you received and the subsequent denial of your duties as novice mistress in your abbess didn’t make you bitter but instead strengthened your faith in God, and your position was reinstated.
May we, with your intercessions show this same dedication, even if our stigmata and sign of Jesus’ Cross is only visible to us on the inside.
Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
St Veronica Giuliani, pray for us!
